paragraphs.first: Welcome to my digital world! I am Ivan, a hybrid web developer with experience in several key areas. I am currently studying ICT Analyst, which has given me a solid background in information technology.
paragraphs.second: Every project is an opportunity to merge my technical skills with my boundless creativity, as well as to rigorously apply logic and problem solving. In my portfolio, you can explore examples of projects that reflect this unique combination of skills. I invite you to explore my portfolio and download my CV to learn more about my experience and past projects - I hope you enjoy exploring my work!
paragraphs.third: Do you have a question or an idea in mind? I am here to help you! Feel free to contact me via email. I look forward to hearing your thoughts and collaborating on your next project.

design.title: Design
design.text: Design is the fusion of aesthetics and function to create visually striking and effective experiences.

frontend.title: Frontend
frontend.text: Creation of attractive and functional visual interfaces. Specialized in translating creative designs into intuitive user experiences.

backend.title: Backend
backend.text: Construction of a robust server logic, dedicated to data processing and communication between the frontend and the database.

deployd.title: Deployd
deployd.text: Efficient deployment of solutions, ensuring rapid and effective implementation of services and applications.

data-base.title: Data Base
data-base.text: Creation and management of databases for efficient storage and retrieval, ensuring a coherent and reliable flow of information.

maintenance.title: Maintenance
maintenance.text: Updates, fixes and optimizations to ensure a smooth experience and optimal performance in web environments.

card1.title: Web3 Platform
card1.text: Decentralized platform that uses blockchain technology to allow users to run crowdfunding campaigns without the need for traditional financial intermediaries.

card2.title: Local Eyez
card2.text: Redesign of the user interface of LocalEyez, a platform dedicated to suggesting local events and experiences personalized according to user interests.

card3.title: Quick Bus
card3.text: Development of a bus travel application that facilitates trip planning, focused on creating an intuitive and friendly user experience.

card4.title: PillCare
card4.text: This medication reminder app is Developed as a team using Scrum as a methodology. I carried out my role as a frontend, working closely collaboration with the team to present a product that met the stated requirements.

card5.title: My Daily Nosh
card5.text: User experience for My Daily Nosh, a meal planning app with features including collaborative shopping lists, smart ingredient scanning, and personalized recipe recommendations. Simplifies food preparation and makes it easy to connect with other food lovers.

card6.title: Portfolio CRUD
card6.text: The site has login, authentication, user, and has a database that through an API allows you to perform CRUD functions for all sections.

card7.title: Dash Board
card7.text: A visual tool that enables users to monitor and analyze real-time data related to cryptocurrencies, using an API.

card8.title: Third-Eye
card8.text: This is a presentation to clients of ThirdEye, an attractive and modern web platform to promote 360Â° property tour services for the real estate sector. In this context, the foundations are established that will serve as a foundation for the continuous evolution of the product.

card9.title: Landing Page
card9.text: This is a striking and modern page, aimed at the fintech industry. The goal of this page is to attract the user's attention and motivate them to act with calls to action. Developed with React and Tailwind.
